page.title: 18LIFE-STYLES
page.content:
{NEW ESTATE} LIFE IN HERNE BAY IS A FAMILIAR ROUTINE. I GET UP AT 7.3OA.M. ON SCHOOL DAYS AND HAVE BREAKFAST. I START WALKING TO SCHOOL AT 8.3O P.M. AND ARRIVE AT 8.45 P.M. THE NEXT 6 HOURS IS THEN SPENT AT SCHOOL. AT HOME MY LEISURE TIME IS SPENT WATCHING T.V.,READING BOOKS OR PLAYING TENNIS WITH MY SISTER. I GO TO BED AT 9 P.M. OR 9.3O P.M. I WATCH TELEVISION OR READ AT THE WEEKENDS OR PLAY STOOLBALL WITH MY SISTER. OUR HOUSE IS IN A NICE PLACE FACING THE COUNTRYSIDE. THE GARDEN IS QUITE BIG TO PLAY IN. I GET 25P. A WEEK AND SPEND IT ON SWEETS.
{I LIKE LIVING IN HERNE BAY.
